title: 3 Easy Ways to Manually Turn Off a Samsung Phone

steps.title: Press and hold the Side and Volume down keys at the same time.
steps.content: Press and hold the Side and Volume down keys at the same time. Holding the Side key alone will activate Bixby, so be sure to hold both keys down simultaneously. After a few seconds, the Power menu should appear. If you don't hold it long enough, you may take a screenshot instead.

steps.title: Tap Power Off and Power Off to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Power Off and Power Off to confirm. If you want to power off your phone using the Side key alone, you can change this setting. Press and hold the Volume Down and Side key. Tap Side key settings . Under Press and hold , select Power off menu . Next time you press and hold the Power button, you'll get the Power Menu instead of Bixby. [1] X Research source If you just want to restart your phone, press the Volume Down and Power key at the same time. Hold for about 15 seconds until you see the startup logo.

steps.title: Press and hold the side key.
steps.content: Press and hold the side key. It's on the right side of your phone and is also called the Power key. If you changed this to trigger the Power menu instead, you can access Bixby by using a voice command such as, "Hey Bixby." If you don't have voice commands set up either, you can also summon the voice assistant by double-tapping the Power/side key. [2] X Research source You must have Bixby activated to use this method.

steps.title: Say "Turn off the phone.
steps.content: Say "Turn off the phone. " If Bixby has been set up, your phone will turn off.

steps.title: Press Power off (if prompted).
steps.content: Press Power off (if prompted). You might need to tap to select between Power off and Reboot to continue.

steps.title: Swipe down using two fingers.
steps.content: Swipe down using two fingers. This will draw down the Quick settings panel. [3] X Research source If you use one finger, the panel will only half open and you'll need to swipe again to pull the panel down completely.

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . The power icon is towards the upper right side of the screen next to the gear icon.

steps.title: Tap Power Off to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Power Off to confirm. After you've confirmed that you want to turn off your Samsung, it will power off.
